|serial = yes,, |jtag = yes,,

|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/30/2012 |estreldate = 06/10/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Images of the label for the RT-AC1750 show that it uses the MSQ-RTAC66U FCC ID. :Details for this device are copied from the [[ASUS RT-AC66U]]. As of 09/07/2017, the current latest firmware update provided for these two routers :(3.0.0.4.380.7743, dated 06/26/2017) is identical.
C:\>fc /b RT-AC1750_3.0.0.4_380_7743-g2cf84e9.trx RT-AC66U_3.0.0.4_380_7743-g2cf84e9.trx Comparing files RT-AC1750_3.0.0.4_380_7743-g2cf84e9.trx and RT-AC66U_3.0.0.4_380_7743-G2CF84E9.TRX FC: no differences encountered
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== This is exactly the same hardware as [[ASUS RT-AC66U|AC66U]], its possibly safe to assume supported thrird party firmware for the [[ASUS RT-AC66U|AC66U]] will fork for this device.
Flashing dd-wrt see [[ASUS RT-AC66U#Flashing|ASUS RT-AC66U]]
==See also== *ASUS RT-AC1750 (A1) - BCM4706 (@600 MHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1750 B1]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900]] (R/V2) - BCM4709A0 (@1.0 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900P]] - BCM4709C0 (@1.4 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900U]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC66U B1]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC66U]] (A1) - BCM4706 (@600 MHz) :*[[ASUS RT-AC66R]] (Store by ''Best Buy'') :*[[ASUS RT-AC66W]] (White) *[[ASUS RT-N66U]] (B1) - BCM4706 (@600 MHz) *[[ASUS RT-N66U C1]] - BCM4708C0 (@1.0 GHz)
